review_blob: Pours with a good head and earthy, nutty nose.  First hit on the tongue is creamy and full-flavored, but taste trails off at the end, leaving a watery aftertaste.  Color is a rich brown.  Above average, but lack of aftertaste keeps it from being a top brew.
Golden color, thin taste.  Used it as a "lite" beer substitute at my wedding, and the lite beer drinkers really enjoyed.  Not my preferred style.
